LanguageData.PP.MaxInteractDistance.Label: Max interaction distance
LanguageData.PP.MaxInteractDistance.Desc: Maximum distance between two pawns for them to be considered valid interaction targets (this only affects interactions added by PP).
LanguageData.PP.CasualLovinPregChance.Label: Casual Lovin' pregnancy chance
LanguageData.PP.CasualLovinPregChance.Desc: Chance for a pawn to get pregnant from casual lovin', before other factors such as fertility.
LanguageData.PP.IntimateLovinPregChance.Label: Intimate Lovin' pregnancy chance
LanguageData.PP.IntimateLovinPregChance.Desc: Chance for a pawn to get pregnant from intimate lovin', before other factors such as fertility.
LanguageData.PP.SeducedLovinPregChance.Label: Seduced Lovin' pregnancy chance
LanguageData.PP.SeducedLovinPregChance.Desc: Chance for a pawn to become pregnant in a seduction encounter, before other factors such as fertility.
